import styles from './Home.module.css' import React from 'react' import logo from '../../img/logo.png'; import dots from '../../img/3dots.png'; import coursePic from '../../img/course.png'; import plus from '../../img/plus.png'; import nopfp from '../../img/no-profile-picture-icon.png' import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; export default function Home() { const [optionsVisible, setOptionsVisible] = useState(false); const optionsRef = useRef(null); const [clickedDots, setClickedDots] = useState(null); const toggleOptions = (event) => { const dotsId = event.currentTarget.id; if (dotsId === clickedDots) { // If same dots were clicked again, hide options setOptionsVisible(false); setClickedDots(null); } else { // Show options for clicked dots setOptionsVisible(true); setClickedDots(dotsId); } }; return (
